Scene:
Yosikata's Mansion
(Yoshikata yakata / 義賢館)

Play: The Nunobiki Waterfall (源平布引滝)

Production: November 1970

– Click image to view.



Narrators (Tayu):

Toyotake Shimatayū VIII (豊竹嶋大夫 (八))

Toyotake Tokutayū (豊竹十九大夫)



Shamisen Players:

Tsuruzawa Dōhachi II (see also Tsuruzawa Tokutarō) (鶴沢道八 (二))

Nozawa Katsutarō II (野澤勝太郎 (二))
